This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 772 Sq.
Ft.
Find the perfect blend of beauty and balance, form and function, work and play at the Cielo, DTC's newest urban apartments in the heart of southeast Denver.
With our central location, you are just minutes from fine dining, shopping, recreation, and within walking distance to the Belleview light rail station.
This luxurious community features a high-tech fitness center with TVs, clubroom with kitchen, Wi-fi cafe with java bar, plasma TV and DVD player.
An opulent swimming pool with spa with Wi-fi service and an outdoor fireplace lounge with BBQ grills for your leisure.
Interior finishes include exotic granite countertops, full size washers and dryers with electric fireplaces in select floor plans.

Each home includes a natural, light maple hard-wood style flooring in kitchens and entries, with custom-designed espresso finish cabinetry, clean and black steel energy efficient appliances, electric ranges, built-in microwaves and dishwashers, nine foot ceilings with crown molding and modern track lighting, earth- toned accent walls and oversized walk-in closets.
Center yourself at Cielo.
Features:

Microwave, Vinyl plank flooring, Custom cabinetry, 9 ft ceilings, Stainless appliances, City and mountain/greenspace views, In-unit washer and dryer, Private patio, Breakfast bar, Ice maker, Dishwasher, Soaking tub, Central heat, Open layout, Private balcony, Walk in closets, Central air conditioning, Energy Star appliances, Electric fireplace, Separate dining area, Large closets, Pantry, Linen closets, Ceiling fans, Garbage disposal, Key fob entry, Granite countertops
Community Amenities:

Towel service, BBQ area, Near public transportation, shopping and entertainment, Accepts dogs, Business center, Close to I-25, Bellview and I-225, Cardio Equipment, Clubhouse, Hot Tub, Outdoor Pool, 24 hour fitness center, Complimentary Wi-Fi, Cyber Café, Conference room, Reserved Parking, Accepts cats, Garage parking
Pet Policy
Cielo welcomes your pet!
We are a pet friendly community offering plenty of space for your pet to run and play.
Our apartments accommodate up to two pets per home.
Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.
Your pets will love it here!
